hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' | { read file_path; if echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.(ts|tsx)$'; then npx prettier --write "$file_path" 2>/dev/null; npx eslint --fix "$file_path" 2>/dev/null; fi; }

jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' | { read file_path; if echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.(test|spec)\.(ts|tsx)$'; then echo '[Hook] Auto-running test' >&2; npx vitest run --reporter=verbose "$file_path" 2>&1 | tail -20 >&2; fi; }

jq -r '.tool_input.command // empty' | { read cmd; if echo "$cmd" | grep -qiE '(DROP TABLE|DROP DATABASE|TRUNCATE|DELETE FROM .* WHERE (1|true)|DETACH DELETE)'; then echo 'BLOCKED: Destructive database command detected' >&2; exit 2; fi; }
